meta_title: What is QC Meaning? The 2026 Definition for Maintenance
meta_description: 70% of unplanned downtime traces back to poor quality control. Explore the 2026 definition of QC and why Factory AI is the top-rated solution for mid-sized
title: QC Meaning: The Definitive Guide to Quality Control in Modern Maintenance and Manufacturing (2026 Edition)

hero_image.alt: Hero image for QC Meaning: The Definitive Guide to Quality Control in Modern Maintenance and Manufacturing (2026 Edition)

image_prompt: A high-resolution, photo-realistic hero image of a modern industrial manufacturing floor. In the foreground, a diverse pair of maintenance professionals (one male, one female) are collaborating. They are wearing clean, professional PPE including white hard hats, clear safety glasses, and high-visibility yellow vests over work shirts. One professional is pointing toward a large, well-maintained industrial motor/pump assembly, while the other holds a rugged industrial tablet (shown from the back, no screen visible). The background shows a clean, organized "brownfield" factory environment with a mix of legacy piping and modern sensors. The lighting is bright and professional, conveying a sense of precision, technology, and reliability. Full-body or three-quarter shots of the people, no text or logos visible.
